mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_name=#{mem_name} WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT PROD_ID FROM PROD WHERE PROD_ID != 'meal-00351' AND PROD_ID != 'biscuit-01026' AND PROD_ID != 'ice-00066' AND PROD_ID != 'food-01065' AND PROD_ID != 'drink-00866' AND PROD_ID != 'necessities-01022' AND EVENT_ID = 'BASIC1' AND PROD_PRICE >4000
